posts.postText:
I miss Richland from other servers i played on, was one of my favorite maps since it was so much fun planteing a C4 in one row of ohuses to force inno to the other side. Although i do realise there is a problem with blocking the trap on the basement stairs, i could assuem that we could just have Udane easly remove this?!

Also Minecraft was my favorte map on this server, untill it was removed. It was bright, colorful and made my day. It was also lots of fun becuase the small map made you think of ways to kill. I.E: In the T tester basement, spray everyone down tehre with Huge, then break glass , jump down and move to land in water next to rock. Instant win and great escape with people are up top if your fast enough.

I really do miss both of these maps, but the one i want to see backt the most is Minecraft!
There should also be a "neither" option... Although this vote will not influence my decision on keeping them off the server or adding them again.

+ Support  for Richland.
 -Support  for Minecraft.

I'm also going to add a "None" option to your poll.

Edit: Or neither lol, looks like Gash had the same idea.
I'd rather clue get put back, but since it seems to break the server that isn't possible :(
